short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Quickly and easily search and manage your bookmarks. Displays recently added or frequently used bookmarks. Dark and light mode.
short.de: Suchen und verwalten Sie Ihre Lesezeichen schnell und einfach. Zeigt kürzlich hinzugefügte oder häufig verwendete Lesezeichen an.…
short.es: Busque y administre sus marcadores rápida y fácilmente. Muestra los marcadores añadidos recientemente o los más utilizados. Modo…
short.fr: Recherchez et gérez vos favoris rapidement et facilement. Affiche les favoris récemment ajoutés ou les plus utilisés. Mode sombre…
short.it: Cerca e gestisci i tuoi segnalibri rapidamente e facilmente. Mostra i segnalibri recentemente aggiunti o quelli più utilizzati.…
short.tr: Yer imlerinizi hızlı ve kolay bir şekilde arayın ve yönetin. Yakın zamanda eklenen veya en çok kullanılan yer imlerini gösterir.…

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This handy tool simplifies bookmark management with a clean, user-friendly interface. You can view recently added or frequently visited bookmarks and seamlessly organize them. With the option to toggle between dark and light modes, it adapts to your style. Plus, you can easily edit or remove bookmarks, while your preferences and settings are saved automatically for convenience. Enjoy browsing with ease!
